Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.client

Class ServerHandler

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.client.ServerHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, java.lang.Runnable
public class ServerHandler
extends java.util.Observable
implements Observer, java.lang.Runnable
this class is responsible for communication client-server notify client when read something by an observer pattern
